Description

This api is designed to query different services (Carto, LTSB, etc) in order to return the bounding box and/or coordinates for a queried feature. Features to be queried include an address, place, municipality, and PLSS.

Request Parameters

Parameter

Details
streetAddress

Description: A search parameter for the single line address search.

Values: WI Street Address

Example: streetAddress=445 W Johnson St Madison WI 53703
gazetteer

Description: A search parameter for the gazetteer search.

Value: Place name

Example: gazetteer=East Towne Mall
county

Description: A search parameter for the county search. Only valid for WI counties.

Value: WI County name

Example: county=Adams
cityTownVillage

Description: A search parameter for the city, town, village search.

Value: Municipality name

Example: cityTownVillage=Washington
township

Description: A search parameter for PLSS and PLSS-Section search.

Value: Township number (1-53)

Example: township=5
range

Description: A search parameter for PLSS and PLSS-Section search.

Value: Range number (1-31)

Example: range=3
dir

Description: A search parameter for PLSS and PLSS-Section search.

Value: Direction (E or W)

Example: dir=E
sec

Description: A search parameter for PLSS-Section search.

Value: Section number (1-36)

Example: sec=1

Example usage

URL for the root directory on development server:

https://dev.sco.wisc.edu/searchControl/Joe/searchControl/SCOSearch.php

Example usage for city, town, and village search:

https://dev.sco.wisc.edu/searchControl/Joe/searchControl/SCOSearch.php?cityTownVillage=port+washington

JSON response syntax


    {
        "rows":[
            {
                "display_name": "",
                "coordinates": [lat,lng],
                "bbox": {
                    "sw": [lat,lng],
                    "ne": [lat,lng]
                }
            },
            {
                "display_name": "",
                "coordinates": [lat,lng],
                "bbox": {
                    "sw": [lat,lng],
                    "ne": [lat,lng]
                }
            }
        ]
    }

Example JSON response


    {
        "rows":[
            {
                "display_name": "Port Washington City, Ozaukee County",
                "coordinates": [43.38788651496,-87.885514700978],
                "bbox": {
                    "sw": [43.351145890915,-87.916200390725],
                    "ne": [43.424627139005,-87.85482901123]
                }
            },
            {
                "display_name": "Port Washington Town, Ozaukee County",
                "coordinates": [43.412249885744,-87.865521925926],
                "bbox": {
                    "sw": [43.368280984618,-87.920851695066],
                    "ne": [43.456218786869,-87.810192156786]
                }
            }
        ]
    }
